refsect2.title: enum SchroEncoderFrameStateEnum
refsect2.programlisting: typedef enum { SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_NEW = 0, SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_ANALYSE = (1<<1), SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_HAVE_GOP = (1<<7), SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_HAVE_PARAMS = (1<<8), SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_PREDICT = (1<<2), SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_HAVE_REFS = (1<<10), SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_HAVE_QUANTS = (1<<11), SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_ENCODING = (1<<3), SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_RECONSTRUCT = (1<<4), SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_POSTANALYSE = (1<<5), SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_DONE = (1<<6), SCHRO_ENCODER_FRAME_STATE_FREE = (1<<9) } SchroEncoderFrameStateEnum;
